Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Hair dryer didn t work Neither it worked in the other room of our companions Shower water got cold during my shower
Positive_Review: Clean room with bit of French vibe Perfect Location in terms of safety and convenience The staff are really nice especially the young lady they all speak English quite well They kindly let us leave the luggages there after check out

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Small snafu with AC unit in room but staff tried to help with it
Positive_Review: Incredibly spacious and comfortable Bathrooms to die for Fantastic breakfast VERY comfortable beds In thirty years of coming to Paris I have never been more comfortable HIGHLY recommend and will be back if I can get it

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast was included last time I stayed buy now it s additional
Positive_Review: Really comfortable room and bed Staff were really nice Right next to metro stop that goes to Gare de nord plus easy walking distance in to Luxembourg garden and Latin quarter

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Quality bed and bedding Newly fitted bathroom with shower and bath Very spacious by Parisian standards we had superior room Pleasant walk into center via the Jardin de Luxembourg Everything worked eg air con hair dryer etc

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff were tremendously friendly and accomodating From restaurant recommendations general directions to discounted sales for river cruise ticckets they went above and beyond The room was spacious and very clean Breakfast was excellent The location is very convenient as well Just a few steps to Raspail metro station which connects you quickly to all you want to see in the city This hotel will definitelly be my top choice for future trips to Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Our room had recently been renovated and was outstanding The staff in the hotel were excellent they were really helpful and also spoke great English Breakfast was excellent with plenty of options I would definitely recommend this hotel to others

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: It is such a beautiful boutique hotel warm friendly and helpful staff we stayed in the deluxe family room which was so spacious and comfortable for a family holiday and it s a step away from the underground train station

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We chose to get breakfast at local bakeries instead of paying for the hotel buffet The elevator was very small requiring a couple of trips to get to the upper floors
Positive_Review: Small but comfortable this hotel was close to a Metro station and plenty of good dining options The bathroom was well equipped and had an excellent shower

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: No complaints Perfect for our purpose
Positive_Review: Front desk Spoke fluent English knowledgeable about the area and public transportation Room all toiletries provided beds very comfy Convenient to metro

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The hotel staff were very welcoming to a family of tired travellers The room was spacious and the extra gifts added to the luxury The deep bathtub and modern mosaic made it extra special Breakfast was outstanding

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Pillows too big to my taste mattress quite hard
Positive_Review: Overall excellent service and very friendly staff Good buffet breakfast for 18 pp For those not willing to spend 18 pp they offer a continental breakfast for 9 Nice room concept if you consider the total size of the room of approx 15sqm Bed could be a tick longer for taller people not sure about the size but felt like 140cm 190cm Brasserie Le petit broc on the Bld Raspail in 100m for dinner recommended by the night auditor of the hotel was really nice at affordable rates and good quality cuisine Will certainly reconsider the hotel on a next stay in Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: More milk cream could be supplied in room but no problem having further supplies delivered
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly and accommodating Great location Will stay there again when next visit Paris Breakfasts were a great start to the day

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Clean quiet good sound insulation comfortable pleasant staff good service 50 meters to Metro station good choice of restaurants within easy walking distance

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Great property great neighborhood Very quiet and calm place Great breakfast Staff was very polite and very friendly Would definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The beds were very comfortable The rooms were well appointed even including information about the art therein The manager gave us good recommendations We especially loved the balconies very lovely just as one pictures when thinking of Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The housekeeping at the hotel was quite bad When we asked the reception to make sure the beds were made properly they simply left us a new set of sheets on the bed and dirty laundry on the floor Very disappointing
Positive_Review: The property was very conveniently located just 100 m from the Raspail metro station The room size and facilities were quite comfortable for 3 people

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Not just for this particular hotel but all the others we stayed in no one has washcloths
Positive_Review: A lovely facility very clean close to the subway an the Hop On Hop Off stop Very convenient to a number of great cafes and restaurants Very comfortable rooms

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Well situated for metro and so quick to all that Paris has to offer Montparnasse itself very pleasant Bedroom well appointed with clean comfortable feel and view from the balcony Continental breakfast at 9 euro enough to fill up on

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The hotel staff and receptionists were genuinely happy to have you as their guest They treated all guest who checked in or out with the same level of concern and quality The room our family stayed in was a suite Enough room for 4 adults The view from our suite was superb as you peered over a small window balcony So Parisian

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: A little bit of a walk to Luxembourg gardens but only ten minutes
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel Great value Difficult to find two double beds in this price range This had a family suite My five year old got a goody bag

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Fabulous hotel with lovely rooms Very attentive and helpful staff When booking reserve a superior room and you won t be disappointed Very close to Raspail Metro station and Gare du Montparnasse is walkable Would certainly stay at this hotel in the future

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: It s very comfortable but keeps its costs down by being compact Perfect for those out all day seeing the sights or working because you aren t paying for lots of needless space in your room It is 30 seconds from the Raspail metro stop and the lines from raspail take you directly to the Eiffel Tower and to the arc de triomph amongst others Great bars and restaurants all around and an excellent bakery just a 5 minute walk up the road

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Someone on our floor was smoking so we were woken up several times with a smoke filled room This was obviously not the hotel s fault but they were unable to prevent it the next night too
Positive_Review: Good breakfast very nice rooms and facilities and in a great location of Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I could smell cigarette smoke by the door of my hotel room due to its proximity to the breakfast room
Positive_Review: The hotel was very clean and the location was excellent The hotel was walking distance to the train station as well as several cafes restaurants

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The room was really too smal The parking outside the hotel The breakfast
Positive_Review: The staff is friendly and professional The location is great The style of the hotel Clean place

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Bed was too firm needs a top mattress Car and restaurant noise coming up from the street is loud even with shutters closed I loved the place but didn t get to sleep so well Would recommend asking for a top floor room
Positive_Review: Staff welcome and helpfulness Reliability of room service and option to order from awarded restaurant at competitive prices Room appointments and hotel appealing design Excellent breakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The kitchen and cleaning staff sometimes did not speak English
Positive_Review: The reception staff was very helpful The location was great and the hotel was clean with the beautiful design

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: I really enjoyed my stay in this hotel The staff was helpful and always with a smile It s a super charming hotel in a very calm and chique part of Paris

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Tastefully decorated quiet and pleasantly undersized Efficient and friendly staff The 2 bedroom apartment provides generous family quarters for a decent price Not a bustling palace but a very comfortable and relaxing hotel I ll be happy to recommend

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The Hotel is very conveniently located The room is small but nicely decorated The good sized bathroom and a separated toilet are useful The staff are really kind and helpful We had a great time

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: breakfast choice limited compared to price but quality good The kid gift stated in their website for family room was not given to our son but not that important Raspail metro station which is closest to the hotel was closed and hotel needed to tell in advance and in the booking or hotel websites to plan to get off in Vavin station or Edgar Quinet which are also very close
Positive_Review: cleanliness design decor ceramics lighting in the room location toiletries bed linen towels and pillows beds Beautiful books everywhere Airy rooms with lots of day light Very well designed and good size 4 bed family room with suitcase wardrobe drawes which is rare in normal Paris hotels Eveything of the best quality and plush Montparnasse Raspail area with lots of early 90s character Dome Couplule a fondue restaurant nearby Montparnasse cemetry Open Hop on Hop Off bus with station in front of hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: My major complaint was no washcloths I know not much to complain about Breakfast for adults was a bit pricey but really not much more than anywhere else in Paris And it was quite a nice spread Choice of full buffet or just a continental breakfast
Positive_Review: This hotel was highly rated by others but we were still stunned by the luxurious accommodations Truly beautiful rooms immaculately clean nicely decorated firm beds We had a suite with TWO rooms one with a king bed and one with a sofa bed Walkout balcony in each room Location was great Very quiet we did not hear any other guests Free breakfast for your kids Overall very good value for the money

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: That I had to leave so soon
Positive_Review: I loved the location of this charming hotel The room was beautifully appointed comfortable bed I loved the extra long bathtub The staff was professional welcoming friendly I would have loved to stay longer Peut tre la prochaine fois

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The elevator is tiny true of all inner city Paris hotels though
Positive_Review: The rooms were beautiful clean and spacious and good value for money Location right next to the Metro staff friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Great location with plenty of restaurant choices and several supermarkets very close There are also large department stores less than a mile away Friendly and helpful staff Train station is walkable and metro is very close to this hotel
Positive_Review: Wrote in wrong box all the good things

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect Excellent location clean and spacious rooms with beautiful and stylish design Staff very polite Easy access to underground

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Sofa bed as only option for children could have been more comfortable Would be great if they could fit two small singles or pull out beds in same space
Positive_Review: Welcoming staff child friendly helpful information given Peaceful and tasty breakfasts Good coffee Caf s nearby for other meals

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Rooms were small which is typical for city centre but modern and very clean
Positive_Review: Great location next to metro bars and restaurants and supermarket and shops

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We paid a lot for our one bedroom suite and were still charged extra for parking and breakfast didn t feel overly reasonable even for Paris Would have been nice for a four star property to have a gym available
Positive_Review: Our one bedroom suite was designed extremely well for privacy We were traveling with our adult son and it made all the difference The hotel is in a beautiful old building and the rooms have been recently renovated in a subtle modern style that complements the original era of the building quite nicely The garage was right downstairs The neighborhood is fabulous full of great eateries and only a 10 minute walk from the Montparnasse train station

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Not applicable we liked everything about the hotel
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely friendly patient and knowledgable Nothing was too much trouble Location is ideal as there are two main underground lines within a stones throw of the hotel door It s also great for local restaurants and cafes

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect friendly staff helpful reception manager breakfast location spacious room bath accessories the whole atmosphere The only small confusion is about very slow elevator

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Lovely location for the underground nice balcony over looking the main road Lovely little Caf on the corner typically Paris Garage for the car

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful the only issue us there is nowhere to pull up with a can outside we had to partially park over an intersection for our luggage There is a secure storage room that the staff allowed us to keep our bags while we returned our rental and had dinner Nicely decorated and a very comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The breakfast was excellent but providing a smaller breakfast would be an alternative As an older couple we participated in the breakfast only once during our stay of 7 days because for us it was too big of a meal to start the day
Positive_Review: Everything The service was excellent Staff were courteous and helpful Air conditioning was a bonus and the rooms were very clean The mosaics were a special treat The shower one of the best in Europe

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The staff were uninterested the hotel was very unaccommodating when we requested a refund 6 weeks before our stay for the last night as we had to leave earlier Booking com approved the refund but the hotel blamed their decision on Booking com
Positive_Review: Not bad location close to public transport

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The rates per night are okay for Parisian standards but not cheap We didn t have the breakfast for 18 EUR which was quite pricy in our opinion There are so many places to have a good and affordable breakfast in the Montparnasse district
Positive_Review: Right next to Metro station Raspail which brings you to all sights very easily From CDG airport it s also very easy with the RER to Port Royal station The double bed room was very clean and looked newly renovated I would stay here again

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The hotel advertised that it was very close to the train station Gare Montparnasse as if it was just across the street and it was more like a 10 15 minute walk from the hotel No big deal but I thought we were going to just have to take our luggage across the street to the train station
Positive_Review: Very clean and comfortable wonderful staff made us feel welcome and valued as guests The room was a decent size along with a beautiful bathroom

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: the bedroom was small but adequate
Positive_Review: the bed was very comfortable the linen beautiful large shower in bath room the staff friendly and very helpful terrific location 100m to a metro lounge room had English papers and books computer and printer available caf bar bistro close almost at the door step

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The only thing was that the hotel is small so the corridors and rooms are not very spacious
Positive_Review: The level of service is high the place is really clean and the location is perfect Really good value for money

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Great location excellent staff clean and tidy rooms soft beds free wifi and very good air conditioning Great value for money and with the Metro across the street then an ideal base form which to explore the city Lots of restaurants close by

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Best cost x benefit we have stayed at this hotel quite a few times Modern charming comfortable 2 steps away from the metro close to many restaurants

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Staff are amazing Great attitudes very helpful and went out of there way to make our stay brilliant The location is perfect located not far from a metro and many great restaurants Rooms are perfect everything you need with a comfortable bed and very quiet We have been traveling for 2 months and this is one of the best hotels we have stayed in Highly rate it and will be staying here again

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The traffic noise is not louder than any other part of downtown but we are a little perspective because we live in a pedestrian area back home
Positive_Review: Very kind smiley staff Walking vicinity to best places in Saint Germain and downtown Not only to tourist attractions Well off clean area Almost above a good bar to drink coctail and people watch

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The beds could have been a little better but pretty good still
Positive_Review: Great room and bathroom lots of space for Paris And great for the kids Good location in interesting area Staff were great and friendly helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Service was appalling I love france french culture french products history But there is the bad side too this hotel represents that Go elsewhere
Positive_Review: Average

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Well they don t have a fitness facility but I knew that going in
Positive_Review: Just a really nice little hotel with a personal touch The room was as described and just right for me and two kids

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We liked to all but did not take breakfast there because we felt it was steep at 18 However after our comment concerning the high cost of their breakfast they responded most positively and now offer a continental breakfast for 9 So nothing to not like
Positive_Review: Excellent location facilities and helpfulness of staff Loved the book lined reception area We were able to browse books there and borrow them to read in our room International newspaper were available Free stylish umbrellas for guests to borrow as well if needed

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: This is a hotel where the room is a decent size and everything I hoped to find was there e g safe fridge Properly worth 4 stars Friendly reception

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The personal at the reception was really confused talking to himself and seemed to bit unorganized The rooms are very small for a four star hotel for more than 1 2 nights the rooms are too small to stay The elevator was under construction during the days of staying there so carrying luggage from the very top to the very down floor and upstairs in pretty narrow steps might be tricky if you re have heavy bags
Positive_Review: The location is close to bus metro and train station and the connection to the airport CDG is relatively fast and easy The rooms are clean but very small

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Like all french hotels very small lift elevator
Positive_Review: Staff friendly welcoming and very helpful We were getting a train from Montparnasse and it is a great location for that close enough to the station yet not in the confusion and squalor that accompanies large train stations

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: I was staying with mom She really liked this hotel Good location 2 min to the metro station by walk Beautiful Luxembourg gardens 15 min by walk Every staff was very kind and friendly I will definitely come back here next year Thank you so much

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The hotel Aiglon is a nice small hotel located close to a Metro station for ease of getting around The Eiffel Tower Arch de Triumph and Louvre are just short rides away The staff is friendly and knowledgeable and the room was very comfortable and pretty quiet

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The noise of the people next door
Positive_Review: Room is decorated nicely and elegantly The bathroom is new and clean and nice Staff are friendly helpful and always welcome you with a smile Loved it

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Pity breakfast was an additional expense Hot water hot milk and a tea bag does not make a good pot of English tea Although complementary tea coffee were provided housekeeping had left provision for 2 instead of 3 persons We did get the extra cup etc when we contacted reception
Positive_Review: Close to Respail Metro and walking distance from Montparnasse Station Plenty of restaurants nearby Welcoming staff excellent family suite comfy beds and good bathroom facilities Complementary kettle and tea coffee an extra touch English speaking news chanels

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: bathroom needs updating but we knew that before arriving and it was not a massive problem
Positive_Review: great room breakfast and surroundings Super friendly and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nothing could have been better Staff extremely helpful and courteous
Positive_Review: We recently spent four nights at the Aiglon hotel in the Montparnasse area of Paris The hotel is conveniently located one half block from the Raspail metro station and connects to some of the most interesting sights in Paris We noticed in several views the remark that the rooms were small and that is true but this is Paris and par for the course The bathrooms and shower were first rate however and the room very clean The staff was just wonderful and I especially am grateful to the receptionist who counseled me to just go to a concert I had bought tickets for but had gotten confused and missed the proper date We took that advice and all went well and we had an unforgettable evening there Breakfast was excellent with a wide selection and attentive staff I would certainly recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Didn t like the handheld shower The bathroom tile was moldy and or dirty Bathtub was dirt stained Pictures on the web were nothing like the decor of our room
Positive_Review: Towels were big and fluffy Robe and slippers were nice Big space for a city hotel Loved having a balcony to see the city Front desk provided umbrellas for rainy Paris day nice touch

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I didn t like the air quality in Paris as much as I do where I live esp the man smoking on the balcony next to ours I didn t like crowded metros That s about it
Positive_Review: Thanks but I do not really want to write a review for you It was a nice clean hotel with excellent staff

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The bathroom had large clear window with no curtain had concerns regarding privacy At night main door was closed until opened by Reception Sometime needed to wait several minutes as it was unmanned
Positive_Review: Room size and decor location both in central Paris and right near metro station A lot of good resturants quite close by

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We did not take breakfast as it was EUR18 per person including each child That would have been EUR 72 for a family of 4 which I found a little bit too expensive for breakfast I would have wished for a cheaper kids price in many hotels kids eat breakfast for free or definately at a discounted price
Positive_Review: The room suite was perfect for a family with 2 kids 8 and 11 yrs They had a sofa bed in one room for the kids and we slept in the bedroom Nice bathroom and everything was super clean The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful Location is good

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The bed was very creaky and old and not that comfortable
Positive_Review: The staff were lovely the balcony was a real bonus great little hotel close enough to everything Plenty of storage spaces and the bathroom was the best bathroom I ve seen in a hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast was expensive at 18 so gave it a skip and had a nice breakfast out for 10
Positive_Review: Located right next to the metro in a quiet part of the city We had an upgrade to the family room which only had one bed However we had plenty of space Very nice rooms

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Excellent location next to metro and also tourist features to stroll by Straight at the backside of Montparnasse graveyard with all gourmand infrastructure

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and made us feel very welcome A most enjoyable stay Only stayed one night but would have been very happy to stay longer

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The breakfast room did not look appealing so we ate elsewhere as there are many cafes nearby
Positive_Review: Good hotel on a great location for Montparnesse Rooms are well decorated and bathrooms above usual standard in many French hotels Staff are very friendly

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: room is very comfortable and smallish no problem for a single traveler
Positive_Review: First class staff Silence location Very good deal with booking com Will come back with pleasure given the opportunity

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We ve requested one queen size bed when making reservations but there was two single beds just brought together
Positive_Review: Good location very close to metro station The elevator was out of order during our visit it was very nice of them to offer free breakfast for compensation Breakfast was delicious it would worth the money even if we had paid Room was clean

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I would have given a much higher rating but unfortunately upon arrival I found out the elevator was not working and had not been working for more than 2 months It should have been noted on the site as the works have been going for over 2 months and it should have been reflected in a discount on the room price
Positive_Review: Good location clean rooms small but nicely appointed Quiet Breakfast was good but too expensive

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and attentive The elevator was out of service but we were given free access to their lovely breakfast buffet the next morning because of our being on the 4th floor The hotel also kindly accommodated my advance request for a quiet room which they made a point of telling us when we checked in and we really appreciated that

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: This was an amazing location almost on top of the Raspail metro station It s a ten minute walk from the catacombs and is very close to good cafes The staff was incredibly helpful even letting us store our bags after check out The room was small but comfortable perfect for our needs

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: A bad start with an arrogant unwelcoming receptionist The lift was not working with 5 floors to climb and I did not feel well The room was over heated and air conditioning not working Unfortunately you can t open the windows as the hotel is on a high traffic avenue Reception had no idea how to control the temperature nor did they make any effort to help except for shouting at us One of our worse hotel experience ever
Positive_Review: A great location if you like off main track atmospheres

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff Room was perfect very comfortable clean warm and facing a quite street overlooking Montparnasse Cemetery Checked in late after dinner and safely left my bag with them the following day Would definitely recommend based on the rate I got from booking com

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The hotel was generally very old It really needed renovation Bidet in our room was broken and it just had an out of order sign on it instead of being repaired I don t recommend the rooms on top floor The windows are above head level So the room had a cell feeling
Positive_Review: The bed and pillows were incredibly comfortable The location was incredible The Raspail metro station was across the hotel The area is very lively There are a lot of cafes and restaurants at just walking distance

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Right on top of metro 75 meters away from front door Staff was helpful with bags and suggestions for an evening meal Room had all amenities we expected

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: alleys are tiny old building elevator is small you have to wait sometimes for other to use it until your turn comes
Positive_Review: the suite was nice big apartments

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Just wish was one more mirror besides the one in the bathroom Saves time when two people are trying to get dressed in a hurry HINT There was room on the wall for one quite easily
Positive_Review: Everything Room size was excellent staff helpful location excellent across the street from the Raspail METRO stop and short walk to the Gare Montparnasse Breakfast though a bit pricy was lovely We ll probably choose this one next time we are in Paris This place was really lovely

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast seemed expensive so we didn t eat there Traffic a little noisy in morning
Positive_Review: The location was perfect for us as our son is studying just south of Montparnasse so it suited us all

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I think that for the price the breakfast should have been included As I recall the breakfast cost 17 Euros
Positive_Review: The staff were very friendly and helpful especially Camile whom we dealt with most of the time Our room was very comfortable and we had lots of room in the family suite The hotel location was fantastic with the metro across the street and lots of restaurants etc on the area I loved looking out the window onto a very Parisian street with trees Location was also pretty quiet

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nothing really other than perhaps the cost could have been a little less
Positive_Review: Staff were very efficient Our family suite was spotless and comfortable Very nice breakfast The location of the hotel on the outskirts of the historical sector was pleasant with the Montparnasse Cemetery and a good shopping district close by and Luxembourg Gardens within walking distance A very nice hotel we would stay there again and thoroughly recommend

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nice room but very small Tiny in fact Very small pokey elevator I used the stairs but luckily I was only on the second floor Did not take breakfast option as highly overpriced at 17
Positive_Review: Handy location for purpose of my trip Nice room just too small Nice staff

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The doors are wafer thin you hear everything including it sounds like people in the hall are in your room The bathroom was oblong shaped and did not have a shower it was awkward and not relaxing to try and bath Last the towels were old and thin nothing that you would expect from a 4 star hotel let alone 2 star They were really worn out and should have been replaced a long time ago Would stay here for the right price if I liked to take baths and if I planned on travelling with my own towels otherwise would not stay here again Last they have a policy that when you leave you must leave your key at the front desk We are not used to such a policy at any other hotel and it was a bit unsettling to do so Though nothing appears to have gone missing
Positive_Review: Looked nice from the pictures and from the outside once we arrived Also the staff are very friendly and provided an ice bucket upon request much to our delight

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: As it regards the breakfast the price of 17 euro I thought I had more choice to improveregarding the breakfast could have more choice to improve
Positive_Review: They lent me the battery charger of cell phone for free I was saved

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: For a four star hotel and the price rooms were small Breakfast for what they offer is far too expensive
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is good with restaurants and shops nearby Staff were helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Not enough power sockets in the room could have done with an extension lead Logging into Wifi every 24 hours was a pain Breakfast was average but plenty of choice locally No shower curtain needed to hold shower head which lead to a very wet bathroom but I guess this Parisienne thing
Positive_Review: Location 1 minute walk to metro 2 cocktail bars next to hotel ample number of restaurants within easy walking distance Staff very friendly helpful Rooms very clean and a good size balcony was an added bonus

Hotel_Name: H tel Aiglon Esprit de France
